title: Feed Drop: Real Good Podcast: Why Community and Economy go Hand-In-Hand with Brett Theodos
description: In our second episode of Season 4, we delve into the science of community development with Brett Theodos, Senior Fellow at the Urban Institute. Brett researches neighborhoods and places, and tries to understand what makes neighborhoods work for the people that inhabit them. In this episode, Brett and our hosts discuss the vital relationship between economic development and community building.
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
